title: ‘The US state’s absence at COP30 created a power vaccum in climate action — China’s taken the leadership role but it poses risks’
description: America sees a divided approach to climate action. Investor-driven ESG efforts face challenges but maintain a core group. The tech sector leads in climate data innovation, though AI ambitions now compete. China emerges as a significant climate leader, offerin…
content: Jason Jay is Director of the MIT Sloan Sustainability Initiative. Speaking with Srijana Mitra Das in ET Evoke, he discusses climate action by US corporates in the era of Donald Trump as well as a gre… [+6499 chars]
